attributes.action: please educate nursery staff and school teachers to stop motivating children with sweets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My 2 year old daughter could be incentivised to use the potty with red pepper so why does it sound bizarre?

Nursery staff and school staff are enculturing children from the youngest of ages to eat sweets as rewards and so develop bad eating habits,  in spite of parents express wishes not to do so.

Please recognise that good eating habits are formed in these critical years and must be addressed by all nursery and school staff.
